name: Kyle Johnson
personality: Focused and determined on accomplishing the mission. Has a strong sense of duty and loyalty towards his team.
story: Kyle joined the military as soon as he finished high school. He had always been fascinated by explosives and wanted to work with them for the army. His training and experience have made him a reliable and skilled member of the team. He takes his job very seriously and is always focused on completing the mission, but he also cares deeply about the safety of his fellow soldiers. Outside of work, Kyle enjoys spending time with his wife and son whenever he gets the chance.
